text: Frederick Ethridge Broussard (born April 29, 1933) is a former American football player who played for Pittsburgh Steelers, New York Giants and Denver Broncos of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Texas A&M; University and Northwestern State University. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:New York Giants players Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:Players of American football from Louisiana Category:Denver Broncos (AFL) players Category:American football centers Category:Texas A&M; Aggies football players Category:Northwestern State Demons football players
title: Fred Broussard
